result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Amanda Christine Warfel

records.addlTxt:
9:59 AM Apprs: CO: S. Needham, Rpr: V. Kasten, Clerk: B Harris, Defendant Amanda Christine Warfel in court.  Prosecuting attorney Michael Joseph Becker in court for the State of Wisconsin.  DE believes Atty Dobbe has been appointed to this case, Court notes Atty Dobbe was appointed to file 21CM677.  Atty Satorius will follow up with PD's Office to confirm Atty Dobbe will be appointed to this matter also. DE verified address and phone number.  Bond continues. Adjourned at 10:02 AM. bph
Pre-trial conference scheduled for December 7, 2022 at 08:00 am.
Pre-trial conference on December 7, 2022 at 08:00 am.

It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, A. Lacoursiere.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

If the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bail jumping.

NG. Bond ordered.  Adjourned at 2:40 PM. bph

filed by DE requesting to have WA quashed.   Per SRN on 8/29/22.  QUASH WA and set for IA Thurs 9/1/22 at 1 pm.  Call DE and indicate that she must be here - failure to appear will result in the warrant being issued. Per JA- DE's vm box was full. JA will continue to call and attempt to advise. bph

DE's boyfriend called asking about DE's warrant, as she was not aware of her court date. Clerk advised a summons and complaint was filed by the DA for 8/18 and due to DE's non-appearance a body only warrant was issued. Clerk advised DE could right a letter requesting to quash the warrant or turn herself in to the jail to be seen at intake.  gll
Statewide. Signed by EFV on 08/18/22. arc    c: SCSO with complaint. e: DA
